title: Car Accidents
excerpt: Expert legal representation for car accident victims across New Jersey. We fight for maximum compensation for your injuries.

children.text: Being involved in a car accident can be overwhelming. At Turuchi Law Firm, we provide aggressive representation for car accident victims throughout New Jersey. Our experienced attorneys understand the physical, emotional, and financial toll these accidents take on victims and their families.

We handle all types of car accident cases including rear-end collisions, T-bone accidents, head-on collisions, multi-vehicle pileups, hit-and-run accidents, and accidents involving uninsured or underinsured motorists.

Our firm has recovered millions of dollars for car accident victims. We work on a contingency fee basis, meaning you pay nothing unless we win your case. We handle all negotiations with insurance companies and are prepared to take your case to trial if necessary.

seo.metaTitle: Car Accident Lawyer NJ | Essex, Union, Hudson County | Free Consultation
seo.metaDescription: Injured in a car accident in NJ? Our experienced attorneys serve Essex, Union, Hudson & all NJ counties. Free consultation. Call 732-210-6410 today.

title: Slip and Fall / Premises Liability
excerpt: Hold negligent property owners accountable for slip and fall injuries. We help victims recover compensation for medical bills and lost wages.

children.text: Property owners have a legal duty to maintain safe premises. When they fail to do so and someone gets injured, they can be held liable. Our attorneys handle slip and fall cases in stores, restaurants, parking lots, apartment complexes, and other properties throughout New Jersey.

title: Dog Bites & Animal Attacks
excerpt: New Jersey has strict liability laws for dog bites. We help victims recover full compensation regardless of the dog's prior history.

children.text: Dog bite injuries can be severe, causing physical scars, emotional trauma, and significant medical expenses. New Jersey law holds dog owners strictly liable for injuries caused by their pets, meaning you don't have to prove the owner knew the dog was dangerous.

title: Family-Based Immigration
excerpt: Reunite with your loved ones. We handle I-130 petitions, green card applications, and family-based visa processing.

children.text: Family reunification is a cornerstone of U.S. immigration law. Whether you're petitioning for a spouse, child, parent, or sibling, we guide you through every step of the complex immigration process with compassion and expertise.

title: Green Cards & Adjustment of Status
excerpt: Navigate the green card application process with expert legal guidance. We handle adjustment of status and consular processing.

children.text: Obtaining lawful permanent resident status (a green card) is a significant milestone. Our immigration attorneys help clients through both adjustment of status (for those in the U.S.) and consular processing (for those abroad).

title: Citizenship & Naturalization
excerpt: Become a U.S. citizen. We assist with naturalization applications, interview preparation, and oath ceremonies.

children.text: Citizenship is the final step in the immigration journey. We help eligible green card holders navigate the naturalization process, prepare for the citizenship test and interview, and resolve any issues that may arise.

title: Work-Related Injury Claims
excerpt: Injured at work? Get the workers' compensation benefits you deserve. We handle all workplace injury claims.

children.text: Workplace injuries can happen in any industry. Whether you work in construction, warehousing, healthcare, or an office, you're entitled to workers' compensation benefits if you're injured on the job. We fight to ensure you receive full medical coverage and wage replacement.

title: Construction Site Injuries
excerpt: Construction workers face unique dangers. We handle workers' comp claims and third-party liability cases for construction injuries.

children.text: Construction sites are among the most dangerous workplaces. Falls from heights, equipment accidents, and falling objects cause serious injuries. Our attorneys understand construction site accidents and can pursue both workers' compensation and third-party liability claims.

title: Traffic Violations Defense
excerpt: Fight traffic tickets and protect your driving record. We defend against speeding tickets, DWI, reckless driving, and more.

children.text: Traffic violations can result in fines, points on your license, increased insurance rates, and even license suspension. Our attorneys defend clients against all types of traffic violations in municipal courts throughout New Jersey.

title: DWI / DUI Defense
excerpt: Aggressive DWI defense in New Jersey municipal courts. Protect your license and your future.

children.text: A DWI charge is serious and can have long-lasting consequences including license suspension, heavy fines, and even jail time. Our experienced municipal court attorneys fight to protect your rights and achieve the best possible outcome.
